name: Anti-Trafficking Program
description: Provides legal and social services to trafficked people, including the understanding of government programs available within the local, state and federal systems.
fullDescription: Provides legal and social services to trafficked people, including the understanding of government programs available within the local, state and federal systems.
whatTheyOffer: The Asian Women's Shelter provides trafficked people with the following legal and social services: - Legal Assistance - Assistance with VISA's - Shelter - Case management - Interpretation - Advocacy - Independent living skills
howToGetIt: All services are available by appointment. Call main line (415) 751-7110 for appointment. For crisis, please call 24/7 - (877) 751-0880
